## Description {#details}

Holds the <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/vfshape">VFShape</a> for a specific scalar to vector function mapping.

## Public Member Functions

### getParamIndexForOptionalMask() {#a9b430434548d148d4fcab54003f5f57b}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>std::optional&lt; unsigned &gt; llvm::VFInfo::getParamIndexForOptionalMask () const</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> Set Architecture.

Returns the index of the first parameter with the kind &#39;GlobalPredicate&#39;, if any exist.
